snippet: As Speaker John A. Boehner sought a deal to avert a government shutdown and raise the debt ceiling, a bloc of Republicans demanded a delay in the federal health care law, which the White House called “a nonstarter.”
abstract: House Speaker John A Boehner seeks deal with Democratic and Republican Congressional leaders to avert government shutdown on Oct 1 and raise the debt ceiling; bloc of House Republicans undercuts his deficit-reduction focus, introducing legislation that would increase Pentagon and veterans spending and delay Pres Obama's health care law for year.
lead_paragraph: As Speaker John A. Boehner sought a deal to avert a government shutdown and raise the debt ceiling, a bloc of Republicans demanded a delay in the federal health care law, which the White House called “a nonstarter.”

headline.main: Boehner Seeking Democrats’ Help on Fiscal Talks
headline.print_headline: Boehner Seeking Democrats’ Help on Fiscal Talks

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
